history.proof: intros. unfold is_filter_lim, close in H. srun best use: @is_filter_lim_close, locally_filter unfold: is_filter_lim.

original: intros T y x H. unfold is_filter_lim, close in H. intros eps. specialize (H (ball x eps)). unfold locally. exists eps. intros y0 Hball. apply H. exists eps. apply Hball.
